Surreal Five Stars Red Cliff International Version - Part I & Part II Tony Leung (Actor), Takeshi Kaneshiro (Actor), John Woo (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Drama ["Red Cliff, the epic historical drama based on a legendary 208 A.D. battle that heralded the end of the Han Dynasty. A power hungry Prime Minister-turned-General Cao Cao seeks permission from the Han dynasty Emperor to organize a southward-bound mission designed to crush the two troublesome warlords who stand in his way, Liu Bei and Sun Quan. Vastly outnumbered by Cao Cao's brutal, fast-approaching army, the warlords band together to mount a heroic campaign, unrivaled in history; that changes the face of China forever."] {'Genre': 'Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'John Woo, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Tony Leung', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '4 hours and 48 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.57 x 5.41 x 7.46 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Item model number': '10268', 'Director': 'John Woo', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '4 hours and 48 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 23, 2010', 'Actors': 'Tony Leung, Takeshi Kaneshiro', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Magnolia Home Ent', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'} love this movie Five Stars {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Harold Ramis'], 'Producers': ['Harold Ramis'], 'Starring': ['Bill Murray', 'Richard Henzel', 'Andie MacDowell'], 'Studio': ['Sony Pictures Entertainment']} for those who haven't seen it, please do, Murray rocks forever Five Stars {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Theodore Melfi'], 'Producers': ['Theodore Melfi', 'Peter Chernin', 'Jenno Topping', 'Fred Roos'], 'Starring': ['Bill Murray', 'Melissa McCarthy', 'Naomi Watts']} murray murray murray Five Stars The Monuments Men Comedy, Drama, Cerebral, Compelling ['Based on a true story!
